          <title>
            <string language="en">Metamorphic rocks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Metamorphe Felsen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Roches métamorphiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rochas metamorphic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Roccie metamorfiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεταμορφικοί βράχοι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rocas metamórficas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that a limestone is transformed into marble when heated by hot magma. A rock such as marble is called metamorphic rock.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metamorphic rock</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">limestone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">marble</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mudstone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pressure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rock</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">slate</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß ein Kalkstein in 
Marmor umgewandelt wird, wenn er durch heißes Magma erhitzt wird. 
Ein Felsen wie Marmor wird metamorphen Felsen genannt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve qu'une pierre à chaux 
est transformée en marbre une fois de chauffage par le magma chaud. 
Une roche telle que le marbre s'appelle la roche métamorphique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que uma pedra calcária 
está transformada no mármore quando aquecida pelo magma quente. 
Uma rocha tal como o mármore é chamada rocha metamorphic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che un calcare è 
trasformato in marmo una volta riscaldato da magma caldo. Una 
roccia quale marmo è chiamata roccia metamorfica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ένας ασβεστόλιθος 
μετασχηματίζεται στο μάρμαρο όταν θερμαίνεται από το καυτό 
μάγμα. Ένας βράχος όπως το μάρμαρο καλείται μεταμορφικό 
βράχο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que una piedra caliza 
está transformada en el mármol cuando es calentada por el magma 
caliente. Una roca tal como mármol se llama roca metamórfica.</string>
          </description>
